summary: DM Networks: a live chat app where users can interact with other users and create a simple profile (display name, bio, social media links), with clear in-app explanation of how the project works and branding/attribution that it is managed by DMC Technologies (https://www.dmc-technologies.fr).

existing_features.title: Add Internet Identity authentication so users can sign in/out and the app can identify the current user principal for all profile and chat actions.
Implement user profiles with fields: display name, bio, and social media links, stored per-user (keyed by principal) in the Motoko backend, with frontend screens to create and edit the profile.
Implement a public live chat feed where authenticated users can post text messages and see messages from other users, using periodic polling (not WebSockets) to simulate live updates.

Create a coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across the login, profile, and chat pages. Avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

Add a public (no sign-in required) About/Onboarding section that explains what the DM Networks project is, how users can interact (sign in with Internet Identity, create/edit profile, post messages in the live chat), and clearly states that the project is managed by DMC Technologies with a clickable link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr.
Update the global layout to surface DMC Technologies attribution consistently (e.g., in the footer) while preserving existing branding links already present in the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Live chat for interacting with other users
User profiles with display name, bio, and social media links
Add an onboarding/about section explaining how the project works and include branding/attribution that it is managed by DMC Technologies (link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr)
